scripts.cleanup: echo 'Cleanup dbsetup' && rm -rf dist && rm -rf ../node_modules && rm -rf lambda-layer/dependency-layer
scripts.package-dependency-layer: rm -rf lambda-layer/dependency-layer && mkdir -p lambda-layer/dependency-layer/nodejs && cp -r ../node_modules lambda-layer/dependency-layer/nodejs
scripts.build:all: npm run cleanup && npm install && npm run build && npm run move && npm run package-dependency-layer
